mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.ID, t.NAME, t.CODE, t.ADDRESS, t.FK_PARENT_MENU_ID, t.CREATE_AT, t.CREATE_BY, t.MODIFY_AT, t.MODIFY_BY, t.STATE, NULL COMPETENCE_ID, NULL NAME_PATH FROM SYS_MENU_DATA t INNER JOIN SYS_MENU_COMPETENCE MC ON MC.FK_MENU_ID = T.ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_COMPETENCE UC ON UC.FK_COMPETENCE_CATEGORY_ID = MC.FK_COMPETENCE_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN SYS_SYSTEM_USER U ON U.ID = UC.FK_USER_ID WHERE t.STATE = 1 AND U.STATE = 1 AND UC.FK_USER_ID = #{userId} order by t.CODE
